name: ZOMBIE Slayers (itch)
description:
The instructions to play the game.

"W for up A for left S for down D for right" keys to move 

"left click" to launch the bullets.

you will find a gun its name is MACHINE GUN

it's like a sniper, so what you need to do is go and collect the gun. and beat the zombie's make sure to keep your ammo full don't waste it or you will die.

Thank you.
